response.overview: The Bone Thugs-N-Harmony Live In Concert DVD sees the band perform their chart-topping hits in a nearly one-hour set at the Summer Jam '97 concert. Summer Jam '97 is a major Hip-Hop and Rap concert sporting the slogan 'No Colour Lines, a campaign for unity, positivity, and peace for all. A theme that rang true for Bone Thugs-NHarmony as the group sang Tha Crossroads, Days of Our Lives, and Look Into My Eyes in perfect harmony in the memory of Notorious B.I.G and Eazy-E. Bone Thugs-N-Harmony Live In Concert truly captivates the spirituality, melodious harmony, extraordinary fast rapping rhythms, and the energy of the group.
response.tagline: Bone Thugs-N-Harmony Live In Concert truly captivates the spirituality, melodious harmony, extraordinary fast rapping rhythms, and the energy of the group.
response.title: Bone Thugs-N-Harmony: Live in Concert
